Fulfillment with Non-Negotiable Criteria.description: Justification: The candidate brings over six years of hands-on Java development, strong core Java fundamentals, extensive Spring Boot framework usage, REST API experience, and solid familiarity with relational databases, Git, and Maven. He also demonstrates Agile-style project involvement and proven debugging skills across multiple live deployments.

Fulfillment with Negotiable Criteria.description: Justification: He has practical exposure to Kafka, Docker, and Kubernetes and holds a Spring Cloud certification, but lacks explicit cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP) project experience, limited microservices detail, and no evidence of AI/ML API integrations.

Continuity and Recency of Experience.description: Justification: His current role (4+ years) continuously leverages Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, and SQL database work, reflecting recent non-negotiable expertise; however, usage of cloud services and microservices architecture appears less up-to-date.
